title: The Prophets
description: This brochure provides a concise and enlightening overview of the 25 prophets mentioned in the Qur'an. It serves as a valuable resource for both Muslims and non-Muslims seeking to deepen their understanding of Islamic teachings.

title: Who is Allah?
description: This brochure provides a clear and insightful explanation of who Allah is, tailored for both Muslims and non-Muslims. It is an excellent dawah tool, aimed at educating readers about the core belief in Allah's Oneness, His attributes, and the significance of belief in Him in Islam.

title: What is Islam?
description: An introductory brochure for anyone curious about Islam. Covering basic beliefs, practices, and the spiritual essence of Islam, this brochure serves as a handy resource for dawah efforts and personal understanding.
